text: 13:43 Aposel 11:23; 14:22; Taitus 2:11; Hibru 12:15; 1 Pita 5:12Egha me bar God ko mɨgeir dɨpenim ategha azenan ghue. Ezɨ Judan avɨriba ko gumazamizir igharaziba, me Judan Arazibar gɨn zuir gumazamiziba, me Pol ko Barnabasɨn gɨn zui. Ezɨ aning me mɨgɨa, men nɨghnɨziba fa ghaze, ia Godɨn nɨghnɨzimɨn gɨn mangɨ an apangkuvimɨn apengan ikɨ.
